__e: I understand that this is a disappointment for you and--
So I'm so sorry that I am such a disappointment to you!
I can also imagine that I'm already a disappointment to you.

We do what we must, in face of growing disappointment.
Feeling like you're a disappointment to someone.
And you will bring me nothing but shame and disappointment, just as he has.
Because it was a look... of disappointment and betrayal.
